event.title: New Year, New  Go - Cross-compiling Go & Hashicorp Vault
event.description:

Join us again for another round of great talks ğŸ—£, food ğŸ• and drinks ğŸ». This time at Brightpearl's offices ğŸ¢! As always, it's going to be great!

ğŸ—£ George Oikonomou - Cross compiling and the compiler evolution

George is a Principal Software Engineer at Actual Experience, where he mostly works on building cross-platform client services.

ğŸ—£ Ben King - Hashicorp's Vault and Go Plugins

Hashicorp's Vault is a powerful, yet intimidating tool! After a brief introduction into Vault and some tips on how to get started, we will be diving into Vault's most complex component: Plugins. Ben currently works at Tumelo, where he helps with the Golang-based backend.

ğŸº As always, afterwards we will be heading to the pub for a drink.

ğŸ“£ We are looking for help with organising! If you or anyone you know would like to help, give us a shout!

ğŸ“£ We are looking for speakers! If you or anyone you know would like to speak, please let us know! We welcome all topics, we can even help you with ideas!

ğŸ“£Help us grow! JetBrains offers free licences to meet-ups with attendance greater than 30. If we can reach this, we will apply and be handing it out as a prize at events.

Thank you to everyone who was involved in organising, our hosts and sponsors:
